/**
 * Get user data
 */export var getUser=function getUser(id){var user;return fetch("http://localhost:3000/user/".concat(id)).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){return user=data.data;});};/**
 * Get user activity data
 */export var getUserActivity=function getUserActivity(id){var activity;return fetch("http://localhost:3000/user/".concat(id,"/activity")).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){return activity=data.data;});};/**
 * Get user average sessions data
 */export var getUserAverageSessions=function getUserAverageSessions(id){var averageSessions;return fetch("http://localhost:3000/user/".concat(id,"/average-sessions")).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){return averageSessions=data.data;});};/**
 * Get user performance data
 */export var getUserPerformance=function getUserPerformance(id){var performance;return fetch("http://localhost:3000/user/".concat(id,"/performance")).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){return performance=data.data;});};
